text: "Midnight Train to Georgia" is a 1973 song by Gladys Knight & the Pips. It was taken from their 11th studio album Imagination. It went to number 1 in the United States, number 5 in Canada and number 10 in the United Kingdom. It won a Grammy Award in 1974. == References == Category:1973 songs Category:Gladys Knight & the Pips songs
title: Midnight Train to Georgia
